entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero except minus 4 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 except calm inland overnight. Low zero except minus 4 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12 except 6 along the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except calm inland early in the morning. High 12 except 6 along the coast. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023
